sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>Yoga</radical> <radical>King</radical> presides over all <kanji>courts</kanji>: law, imperial, and so forth. In this case, you've met him in the court of law, where he is judge, jury, and executioner.
meaningInfo: Picture him sitting above you in the judge's chair in court. He's about to make his judgement.
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>court</kanji> of the Yoga King is against you. You have to turn this around, so you start pushing <reading>ta</reading>ter (<ja>てい</ja>) tots into his tater-tot-hole shaped mouth.
readingInfo: "I hereby sentence you to..." *ploop* "Ooh, this is really good. I hereby sentence..." *ploop* "Wow, are these tater tots? Court dismissed."
